p: Essential oil significantly limited Candida tropicalis, Candida albicans came second, and Candida glabrata and Saccharomyces cerevisiae were in the same homogeneous group in terms of antimicrobial properties. For comparison, the reference drug (Itraconazole) was best limited by Saccharomyces cerevisiae, and the worst was Candida albicans ( Table 14).
